    • getPij

      public Point3D getPij​(Point3D Pc, double height, double width, int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
      Auxiliary function for calculating the pixel center
      Parameters:
      Pc - The center of the outer pixel/view plane, within that pixel
      height - The height of the outer pixel/view plane, within that pixel
      width - The width of the outer pixel/view plane, within that pixel
      nX - represents the number of columns (row width) of the outer pixel/view plane, within that pixel
      nY - represents the number of rows of the outer pixel/view plane, within that pixel
      j - columns index
      i - row index
      Returns:
      Pixel center point3D
